Class DLL<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • DLL<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDLL<T>

    public class DLL<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDLL<T>
    Class for a doubly linked list. This code implements a standard version of a DLL. In this case the DLL is implemented with a dummy head and a dummy tail node. The instance variables are size (size to the user, thus total size less 2), head, tail, Accessor and mutator methods are: getHead, setHead, getSize, getTail, setTail, General methods are: add (wrapper that calls addAtHead), addAtHead (to add a node at the head), contains, containsNode (to run the loop to test containment for contains and remove), linkAfter (optional: link after a given node), remove to remove with a data record as parameter, remove optional: to remove a specific indexed node, toString, unlink to unlink a node. Copyright (C) 2012 by Duncan A. Buell. All rights reserved. Used and modified with permission by chongwen guo student.
    Version:
    1.00 2012-07-06
    Author:
    Duncan A. Buell
